text: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, to the saints [in Ephesus], the faithful in Christ Jesus.
Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly realms in Christ.

<st data-num="2531" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> should <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="299" class="">blameless</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2714">before</st> <st data-num="846">him</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>.<n id="5" />

He did this by <st data-num="4309" class="">predestining</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="5206">adoption as</st> his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5206">legal heirs</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="2107" class="">pleasure</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>—

<st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1868" class="">praise</st> of the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he has <st data-num="5487">freely bestowed</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="25">dearly loved</st> Son.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="629" class="">redemption</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="859" class="">forgiveness</st> of our <st data-num="3900">offenses</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>

<st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="4052" class="">lavished</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5428" class="">insight</st>.

He did this when he <st data-num="1107" class="">revealed</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="3466">mystery</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>, <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2107">good pleasure</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="4388">set forth</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="3622" class="">administration</st> of the <st data-num="4138" class="">fullness</st> of the <st data-num="2540" class="">times</st>, to <st data-num="346">head up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all things</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>—<st data-num="3588">the things</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the things</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3739">Christ</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> have been <st data-num="2820">claimed as God’s own possession</st>,<n id="2" /> since we were <st data-num="4309" class="">predestined</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="4286" class="">purpose</st> of him who <st data-num="1754" class="">accomplishes</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="1012" class="">counsel</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>

<st data-num="1519" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> the <st data-num="4276" class="">first to set</st> our <st data-num="4276" class="">hope</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> would be <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1868" class="">praise</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> when<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> (the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation)</st>—when you <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1722">Christ</st><n id="2" />—you were <st data-num="4972">marked with the seal</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st> <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="4" />
who is the down payment of our inheritance, until the redemption of God’s own possession, to the praise of his glory.
For this reason, because I have heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all the saints,

I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3973" class="">cease</st> to <st data-num="2168">give thanks</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> when I <st data-num="3417" class="">remember</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayers</st>.

I pray <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, the <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>,<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="602" class="">revelation</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> your <st data-num="1922">growing knowledge</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="4" />

—since the <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> of your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> have been <st data-num="5461" class="">enlightened</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2821" class="">calling</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> is the <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> is the <st data-num="5235" class="">incomparable</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3174" class="">greatness</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> who <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>, <st data-num="2596" class="">as displayed in</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="1753" class="">exercise</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2904">immense</st> <st data-num="2479">strength</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3739">This power</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1754" class="">exercised</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> when he <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2523" class="">seated</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2032">heavenly realms</st><n id="5" />

<st data-num="5231">far above</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="746" class="">rule</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2963" class="">dominion</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> that is <st data-num="3687" class="">named</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the one to <st data-num="3195" class="">come</st>.
And God put all things under Christ’s feet, and gave him to the church as head over all things.
Now the church is his body, the fullness of him who fills all in all.
